title: Dylan Clapped Back at a ‘Bachelor in Paradise‘ Fan Who Said Hannah G. Can Do Better Than Him
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Dylan Barbour clapped back at a fan who said Hannah Godwin can do better than him.

Dylan and Hannah have been getting serious on Bachelor in Paradise since she chose him over Blake Horstmann.

There’s one more episode of Bachelor in Paradise left and tensions are running high! Well, they are for some people. Dylan Barbour, on the other hand, is taking everything in stride and even just called out a troll in the most chill way possible.

For the most part, since Hannah Godwin finally decided that she’d rather spend time with Dylan than with Blake Horstmann and deal with all that Stagecoach drama, Dylan’s time in paradise has been smooth sailing. And now that they’ve made it to the last week, it’s time for them to really think about their future.

Enter: unsolicited opinions by a BiP fan who thinks they know what Hannah G. needs more than she actually does.

In an exchange caught by the Comments by Bachelor Instagram account, one fan commented on a video of Hannah G. explaining one of her favorite moments in Paradise, which was when Dylan mispronounced “I love Hannah” in Spanish and said, “My name is Hannah” instead. It was a cute video and most of the comments on it were positive, except for the one that said, “You could do so much better than Dylan! You need a MAN!” which is obviously extremely rude and the way she capitalized man is very sus.

Dylan, who is arguably one of the funniest Bachelor Nation peeps on the ’gram, clapped back with, “You tell her, Lauren,” which pretty much squashed a mini feud before it even started.

The finale of Bachelor in Paradise is tonight, and Dylan and Hannah seem to be going pretty strong, so in just a few hours, we’ll find out if they actually got engaged. If you don’t schedule your life around BiP, you can just see who will probably get engaged by reading these Reality Steve spoilers.
